main.name: Raul
main.description: I build inspiring pages using React. Full Stack developer devoted to design and convenience. Currently based in Valencia, Spain
main.bio: I am an artist at heart, with an entrepreneurial spirit, a knack for fine design, and passionate of avant-garde technology. After years diving deep into the GD and communication industry, I now apply my palete to build fresh and fashionable React Apps.
main.contactmessage: Something inspiring in hands? Let's make it real! âœ¨
